name: M & M Aviation Services
about: M & M Aviation Services, located at the Dixon Municipal Airport in Illinois, offers comprehensive flight training, aircraft rentals, and custom charter services. Our experienced flight instructors provide training for various certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Instrument Rating. We cater to both novice flyers and those needing refresher courses. Members of our Flying M Club enjoy lower rental rates, making it an excellent option for frequent flyers. With three aircraft available for rent, we ensure a hassle-free flying experience, skipping the big airport chaos. Our goal is to provide safe, reliable, and affordable flight training to help you achieve your aviation goals. Whether you aspire to fly recreationally or professionally, M & M Aviation Services is dedicated to guiding you every step of the way.
